org.daisy.pipeline.braille.css

Interface TextStyleParser


  • public interface TextStyleParser
    Parse string to SimpleInlineStyle for use in CSSStyledText.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TextStyleParser getInstance() 
      org.daisy.braille.css.SimpleInlineStyle parse(String style) 
      org.daisy.braille.css.SimpleInlineStyle parse(String style, org.daisy.braille.css.SimpleInlineStyle parent)
      Parse a style and inherit from a parent style.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        org.daisy.braille.css.SimpleInlineStyle parse(String style)

      • parse

        org.daisy.braille.css.SimpleInlineStyle parse(String style,
                                              org.daisy.braille.css.SimpleInlineStyle parent)
        Parse a style and inherit from a parent style. Using this method, rather than using parse(String) and calling SimpleInlineStyle.inheritFrom(cz.vutbr.web.css.NodeData) on the result, allows for caching to happen. As opposed to parse(String), this method always concretizes "inherit" values (even if the provided parent style is null or empty).

      • getInstance

        static TextStyleParser getInstance()
